_comment.Razorpay: Set Razorpay:KeySecret in User Secrets (Development) or environment variables (Production). Never commit secrets to source control.
_comment.Encryption: Set Encryption:MasterKey in User Secrets (Development) or environment variables (Production). Generate a secure 256-bit (32-byte) key and Base64 encode it.
_comment.Email: Set Email:SmtpHost, Email:SmtpPort, Email:SmtpUsername, Email:SmtpPassword, Email:FromEmail in User Secrets (Development) or environment variables (Production). Example: SmtpHost=smtp.gmail.com, SmtpPort=587.
_comment.ConnectionStrings: Set ConnectionStrings:Default and ConnectionStrings:Default_SSL in User Secrets (Development) or environment variables (Production).
_comment.Jwt: Set Jwt:Key in User Secrets (Development) or environment variables (Production).
_comment.UserSecrets: For Development: Use 'dotnet user-secrets set "Key:Path" "value"' to configure secrets locally.
_comment.Production: For Production: Use environment variables or Azure Key Vault. Never store secrets in appsettings files.
